venue.phone: Please Send Me A Message on Meet
venue.name: Davis Square

item.description:
Saturday, 4/17/10, 10 pm show at:
Johnny D's Uptown Restaurant - www.johnnyds.com
17 Holland Street, Somerville - (617) 776-2004
There is generally a $10 cover charge.

We could meet @ 9pm to try to get a table. Since I cannot reserve seats or tables, the earlier we arrive, the better chance of seating.

All reggae lovers and dancers encouraged to join me!!
item.how_to_find_us: Johnnie D's is across the street from the Davis Square MBTA Station. I would meet at the bar...as close to the door as I can get. Would love to get a table though so a 9pm meet up time would work best.
item.name: Interested in attending the Toussaint the Liberator, a reggae & soul band?
